author: alita85
content: okay so I was looking more into it and it turns out that we don't need the `automerge` label for kodiak to auto merge. Looks like kodiak alone is the perfect solution.

author: alita85
content: in reponse to this I removed `automerge` from all PRs

author: gcolvin
content:
<@!104006934562107392> I'm not sure what's happening, but this PR seems not to have automatically merged, despite everything passing.  And I notice you made asked an enigmatic question there a few minutes ago.  I'll refrain from trying to commit more work tonight until things are OK.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4700

author: alita85
content: yeah sorry about this <@!683653554631868440> the failure to merge is due to a tool not working as expected. The enigmatic question you're referencing (I think) is a request to the maintainers of that tool to see why it is not working.

author: gcolvin
content: Yeah, I just noticed your conversation with them.  A good excuse for me to log off and go play my guitar ðŸ˜‰

author: alita85
content: if this happens again then you'll need to edit the body, title, add a label etc. anything to "refresh" the PR

author: alita85
content: I'm in the process of discussing a feature to prevent the freezing with the team of kodiak, but that wont' be ready immediately.
